Description:
The by-product of consuming Uranium Fuel Rods in the Nuclear Power Plant.
Non-fissible Uranium can be extracted. Handle with caution.

Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

The by-product of consuming Plutonium Fuel Rods in the Nuclear Power Plant.
Needs to be stored in a safe location. Handle with caution.

Caution: EXTREMELY Radioactive.
Primarily used as fuel for Drones and Vehicles.

Aluminum Ingots are made from Aluminum Scrap, which is refined from Alumina Solution.
Used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.

The isotope Uranium-238 is non-fissile, meaning it cannot be used for nuclear fission. It can, however, be conversed into fissile Plutonium in the Particle Accelerator.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

Produced in the Particle Accelerator through conversion of Non-fissile Uranium.
Used to produce Encased Plutonium Cells for Plutonium Fuel Rods.

Power Usage: 250-750 MW (500 MW average).
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Plutonium Cells are concrete encased Plutonium Pellets.
Used to produce Plutonium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.
A strange slug radiating a weak strange power.

Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.
A strange slug radiating a strange power.
A strange slug radiating a powerful strange power.

Used for building.
Good for stable foundations.
Derived from Raw Quartz. Commonly used to create glass structures, advanced refinement processes, and alternative production of electronics.

Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.
Steel Beams are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

Used for applying Patterns to structures with the Customizer.

(Patterns can be purchased in the AWESOME Shop.)

Mucus from the power slugs compressed into a solid crystal-like shard. 
It radiates a strange power.

Used for crafting.
Primarily used to build power lines.

Used for crafting.
Multi-purpose building block.
Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles or the Jetpack.
Turbofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.
Used in the Hazmat Suit to absorb radioactive particles.
Used in the Gas Mask to filter out toxics and pollutants from the air.
The parts required to build the basic structure of the HUB.

Used for crafting.
A sturdier and more durable Iron Plate.

Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

Special FICSMAS buildings and parts can be obtained and produced from this FICSIT Holiday present.

*Watch the sky for deliveries from orbit!

A delicious Candy Cane to be enjoyed during the FICSMAS Holidays. 
*Disclaimer: Can't be consumed...
A special Tree Branch, used to produce parts and buildings during the FICSMAS Event.
A fancy Bow, maybe someone can wear this? You certainly can't! Probably, some parts and decorations can be made from this.
It's snow. Not the nice, thick, crunchy kind though... more the disgustingly wet, slushy kind... Guess we can make stuff from it.
This special FICSMAS Star signifies the productivity of FICSIT all across the universe. It also signifies the fact that you have nearly completed the Holiday Event, so it's time to get back to work.
Used for making FICSMAS Decorations.
Again, used for making FICSMAS Decorations.
Still used for making FICSMAS Decorations.
This super special... nope... still just used for making FICSMAS Decorations.
All the FICSMAS Ornaments smashed together to make even more FICSMAS Decorations!
A decoration used to make decorations. Its use cases are questionable.
A corrosion resistant, nitride hardened, highly robust, yet lightweight modular frame.
Circuit Boards are advanced electronics that are used in a plethora of different ways.

Used for crafting.
Primarily used for pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.
A crystal oscillator is an electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.
Project Part #1. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Project Part #2. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Project Part #3. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Project Part #4. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Water, packaged for alternative transport.

This data capsule translates organic chemicals into readable alien genetics information.
Used for researching alien organisms.

Go the extra kilometer! Knowledge is power, and power is just efficiency with fewer steps. Depositing Alien DNA Capsules in the AWESOME Sink provides FICSIT with knowledge, and Pioneers with Coupons.
The high-speed connector connects several cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern so its applications are many and varied.
The Motor creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.
Project Part #5. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Project Part #7. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

These modular generators use superconducting magnets and vast amounts of electricity to produce an easily expandable and powerful magnetic field.

Project Part #6. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

This extremely fast and precise computing system is specifically designed to direct the Project Assembly: Assembly Phase.

Project Part #8. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Uses extreme heat to produce the high pressure plasma required to get Project Assembly into motion.

Project Part #9. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

Nuclear Pasta is extremely dense degenerate matter, formed when extreme pressure forces protons and electrons together into neutrons. It is theorized to exist naturally within the crust of neutron stars.

Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.
Thin, lightweight, and highly durable sheets that are mainly used for products that require high heat conduction or a high specific strength.

Used for crafting.
The moving parts of a motor.
Rubber is a material that is very flexible and has a lot of friction.
A versatile and easy to manufacture material that can be used for a lot of things.

Encased Industrial Beams utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and tensile strength of steel simultaneously.
Mostly used as a stable basis for constructing buildings.
Steel Pipes are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.
Fuel can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles or the Jetpack.

Used for crafting.
A by-product of oil refinement into fuel. Commonly used to manufacture plastics.
A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.

Used for crafting.
A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue. 
Used as a less efficient coal replacement or for aluminum refinement.
Used to package fluids for transportation.
A more robust multi-purpose frame.
Crude Oil, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.
Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.
Steel Ingots are made from Iron Ore that's been smelted with Coal. They are made into several parts used in building construction.
Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into Aluminum Scrap for Aluminum Ingot production.
Aluminum Scrap is pure aluminum refined from Alumina. Can be smelted down to Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.
A mineral acid produced by combining Sulfur and Water in a complex reaction. Primarily used in refinement processes and Battery production.

Uranium Cells are produced from Uranium Ore. 
Used to produce Uranium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.
Used to dissipate heat faster.
Used to keep temperatures of advanced parts and buildings from exceeding to inefficient levels.
Produced by reaction of Nitrogen Gas with Water. Its high corrosiveness and oxidizing properties make it an excellent choice for refinement and fuel production processes.
A versatile container cast from Aluminum Ingots.
Enhances and directs radio signals.
A Computer is a complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behaviour in machines.
Derived from Raw Quartz. Used in the production of advanced radar technology and high-quality display screens.
Caterium Ingots are smelted from Caterium Ore. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

Used for crafting.
The static parts of a motor.
AI Limiters are super advanced electronics that are used to control AIs and keep them from evolving in malicious ways.
Caterium's high conductivity and resistance to corrosion makes it ideal for small, advanced electronics.
A much more efficient alternative for Coal. Used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators.
A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles.
The supercomputer is the next-gen version of the computer.
Used to package gases and volatile liquids for transportation.
Control Rods regulate power output via electromagnetism.
Converts outgoing force into internal pressure. Required to contain unstable, high-energy matter.
The Turbo Motor is a more complex, and more powerful, version of the regular Motor.

Ground down Copper Ingots.
The high natural density of Copper, combined with the granularity of the powder, make this part fit for producing Nuclear Pasta in the Particle Accelerator.
An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce simple explosives.

Ground down Alien Remains in a neat little package.
Used for medical purposes and to research alien organisms.
An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce modern firearms.

Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore one health segment.

Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore two health segments.

Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore half a health segment.

Fully restores health when used.

The FICSIT Medicinal Inhaler can be produced from a variety of different ingredients.

PENDING REMOVAL
This item will (likely) be removed in a future update.

Currently only used as an ingredient in an alternative recipe.
Slows down your fall when activated in mid-air.

The carapace of the alien Hog creature.
Used for MAM research.

The remains of a plasma spitting alien creature.
Used for MAM research.

Used for crafting.
Colorful native flower petals.

Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

Used for crafting.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

The shell-like remains an alien... thing.
Used for MAM research.

The remains of whatever that creepy thing was.
Used for MAM research.
The most energy-efficient form of solid biomass. Can be used as fuel for the Chainsaw.
Liquid Biofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass burners and vehicles can use it for power.
Biomass is much more energy-efficient than raw biological matter.
Liquid Biofuel can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles.
Alumina Solution, packaged for alternative transport.
Sulfuric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.
Nitrogen Gas, packaged for alternative transport.
Nitric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

Used for equipment crafting.
Flexible but durable fabric.
Mainly used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators and for steel production.

Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for electricity.
Caterium Ore is smelted into Caterium Ingots. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

Used for crafting.
The most essential basic resource.
Raw Quartz can be processed into Quartz Crystals and Silica, which both offer a variety of applications.

Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for stable foundations.
Sulfur is primarily used for Black Powder.
Crude Oil is refined into all kinds of Oil-based resources, like Fuel and Plastic.
Nitrogen can be used in a variety of ways, such as metallurgy, cooling, and Nitric Acid production. On Massage-2(AB)b, it can be extracted from underground gas wells.
It's water.
Bauxite is used to produce Alumina, which can be further refined into the Aluminum Scrap required to produce Aluminum Ingots.

Uranium is a radioactive element. 
Used to produce Encased Uranium Cells for Uranium Fuel Rods.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Used as fuel for the Nuclear Power Plant.

Caution: Produces radioactive Uranium Waste when consumed.
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Used as fuel for the Nuclear Power Plant.

Caution: Produces radioactive Plutonium Waste when consumed.
Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.
Explodes on impact, dealing heavy damage.

Electrocutes the target on impact, stunning it for a short time.

Stun duration: 5 seconds
A simple iron rebar that can be shot using the Rebar Gun, for self-defense purposes.

The bullet guidance system, build into this ammunition, allows it to accurately hit any target within the reticle area.
Especially useful when dealing with agile threats, or for Pioneers who can't be bothered to aim properly.
A Nobelisk that detonates into multiple smaller explosions. Practical when clearing out large areas of vegetation and other inconveniences.
A simple explosive, useful for clearing boulders, vegetation, and other obstacles.
Instead of a regular explosion, this Nobelisk creates a deadly gas cloud.

This Nobelisk uses a nuclear fission reaction to generate a massive explosion.

WARNING: Ensure all FICSIT property is clear of the blast zone before detonation.
Instead of a regular explosion, this Nobelisk generates a powerful shockwave.

Merry FICSMAS and a Happy New Year!

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

Fireworks are produced from random ingredients. Primarily used for having a good time.

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

Goes Pfffeeeeew... BOOM! *Sparkle*

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

Compressed dihydrogen monoxide crystals.

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!
This rebar fractures when shot, launching deadly debris in a wide spread but with limited range.
Lightweight, compact, and volatile. These rounds provide extreme capacity and fire rates, at the cost of accuracy.
Standard issue Rifle ammunition, useful for establishing dominance.
